akn:content.akn:p: All fees and penalties collected under this chapter shall be deposited in the fund established under ยง 42-3131.01(b)(1) and shall be expended for the general administration, inspection, and abatement costs incurred in the correction of wrongful conditions in vacant buildings and other nuisance properties; provided, that if any fees and penalties are collected as a tax through the real estate tax sale process, the fees and penalties shall be deposited in the fund established under ยง 42-3131.01(b)(1) after an accounting has been made in accordance with ยง 47-1340(f).
